summary.para: Encrypts a new payload package to the bundle.

param.name: fileName
param.para: The name of the payload file. The file name path must be relative to the root of the package.

param.name: packageStream
param.para: An that provides the contents of fileName. The stream must support , , and .

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an error code.

summary.para: Writes the bundle manifest and blockmap footprint files to the bundle.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an error code.

summary.para: Provides a write-only object model for encrypted bundle packages.
